document.full_text: clashes between forces loyal to the incumbent president, laurent gbagbo, and those who support his rival, alassane ouattara, had almost emptied out the abobo district in abidjan.
document.title: more flee as violence worsens in ivory coast
lines_and_colors: clashes between forces loyal to the incumbent president, laurent gbagbo, and those who support his rival, alassane ouattara, had almost emptied out the abobo district in abidjan.
